bug.author: DSLituiev
bug.summary: [Documentation] cifar10_input.py is referenced but missing on master
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the problem</denchmark-h>
File cifar10_input.py is referenced in documentation, but is missing on master. Documentation piece: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/reading_data>https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/reading_data</denchmark-link>
r0.7 version <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.7/tensorflow/models/image/cifar10/cifar10_input.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.7/tensorflow/models/image/cifar10/cifar10_input.py</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
also missing on <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/deep_cnn>cifar10 tutorial</denchmark-link>
in r1.2 version <denchmark-link:https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow_models/tutorials/image/cifar10/>tensorflow_models/tutorials/image/cifar10/</denchmark-link>

see this issue: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/10711>#10711</denchmark-link>
seems to need a fix on the tutorial doc
